Almost the same,
Watched @WhiteboardCryp1 & @finematics videos

Worked at @TheDopeWars and @LinksDAO

RT Furqan Rydhan
We're hiring for a front-end engineer at @thirdweb_, looking for someone who:
* wants to build dev tools in web3
* enjoys being hands on with customers
* is very proficient in react/ts
* weirdly enjoys build tools like webpack, vite
Feel free to DM myself or @jnsdls
